pages.text: Landguard is a large ship carrying several anti-air guns and two large cranes. Each crane holds a large turret, which can be placed anywhere on the ocean to provide additonal support. Landguard typically protects shorelines, but has been used for other defensive purposes before.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/turret)$(l)Deploy E-54/$$(br)One of Landguard's cranes $(l)deploys a 1 HP turret/$, which floats towards the chosen destination. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)10 Energy/$ to use. ($(l:naval_warfare:ships/ship_types/deployables/landguard_active)E-54 Siege Automaton)
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/anti_air)$(l)Anti-Air Battery/$$(br)Landguard's gun battery $(l)protects the ship and 1 tile surrounding it, destroying any air-based attacks/$ that enter its range.
pages.title: Passive Ability
